com.webdav.domain

Class FolderResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.webdav.domain.AbstractResource
      • com.webdav.domain.FolderResource

  • public class FolderResource
extends com.webdav.domain.AbstractResource
    The AbstractResource class defines the base contract for the in-memory file system objects The FolderResource class defines the base contract for the in-memory folder objects
    Since:
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    M

      • moveTo

        public void moveTo(FolderResource newParent,
                   java.lang.String newName)
        Renames this FolderResource if newParent is the same instance as that returned by getParent. Moves this FolderResource to newParent if previous condition holds false
        Parameters:
        newParent - The new parent of this FolderResource. May be the same as the current parent
        newName - The name to assign to this FolderResource. Will be different if renaming, otherwise the same

      • copyTo

        public FolderResource copyTo(FolderResource newParent,
                             java.lang.String newName)
        Copies this FolderResource within the parent FolderResource if newParent is the same instance as that returned by getParent. Copies this FolderResource to newParent if previous condition holds false
        Parameters:
        newParent - The new parent of this FolderResource. May be the same as the current parent
        newName - The name to assign to this FolderResource. Will be different if copying within the same folder, otherwise the same
        Returns:
        The newly created copy

      • find

        public static FolderResource find(java.lang.String name,
                                  org.hibernate.Session session)
        Searches the database after the specified FolderResource in the specified session
        Parameters:
        name - The unique name of the FolderResource
        session - The current session
        Returns:
        The found FolderResource, or null if not
